text: Brittany Burhop Fallon, Senior Beauty Editor | November 01, 2017 A pro dancer on Dancing With the Stars and So You Think You Can Dance, Jenna Johnson is at the top of her game at just 23 years old. You'd think all she has to do is go to dance practice every day to maintain her incredibly fit physique ( have you seen her abs? ), but Johnson relies on a strict diet and gym regimen, too, which doesn't come easy. Here, the dancer gets candid with us about her daily routine, her personal struggles and what motivates her to push harder.
